statements: UPDATE auditing_activities SET event_description = 'Updated description' WHERE event_id = 1;

UPDATE auditing_activities SET event_timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, event_description = 'Update event' WHERE event_id = 1 AND user_id = 100 AND user_role = 'Admin';
UPDATE auditing_activities SET event_description = 'Revised event' WHERE user_id = 200 AND user_role = 'User' AND event_id = 2;
UPDATE audit_log SET event_description = 'Updated event description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_activity SET activity_description = 'User performed an action' WHERE user_id = 10;
UPDATE audit_log SET event_description = 'Updated audit event' WHERE id = 1 AND user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_activity SET activity_description = 'Modified activity description', activity_time = '2023-01-30 12:00:00' WHERE user_id = 456 AND id = 5;
UPDATE auditing_events SET event_description = 'Updated event description' WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE security_alerts SET alert_description = 'Changed alert description', user_id = 4 WHERE alert_id = 3;
UPDATE auditing_events SET event_description='Updated Event Description' WHERE event_id=1;
UPDATE security_alerts SET user_id=3, alert_description='Critical Alert', alert_timestamp='2023-06-15 09:30:00' WHERE alert_id=2;
UPDATE auditing_activities SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE user_activity SET username = 'new_username', timestamp = '2023-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE user_id = 100;

UPDATE admin_activity SET timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00', details = 'Access granted' WHERE admin_name = 'admin1';
